citation_patterns.notes: City of Chicago parking and camera citations display a 10-digit Notice Number, which must be used to contest or pay the citation.

appeal_mail_address.missing_reason: The official ‘Contest by Mail’ address could not be confirmed because the City of Chicago’s contest-by-mail webpage is restricted; a mailing address must be verified by calling the ticket help line.

phone_confirmation_policy.confirmation_message: Call City of Chicago Ticket Help Line to confirm the correct mailing address for appeals.

city_of_chicago_dof.name: Chicago Department of Finance (Parking, Red Light & ASE)

appeal_mail_address.missing_reason: The official ‘Contest by Mail’ address could not be confirmed because the City of Chicago’s contest-by-mail webpage is restricted; a mailing address must be verified by calling the ticket help line.

phone_confirmation_policy.confirmation_message: Call City of Chicago Ticket Help Line to confirm the correct mailing address for appeals.

verification_metadata.notes: City of Chicago eHearing and payment plan FAQs provide the 10-digit Notice Number requirement but do not list a mailing address; the contest-by-mail page is restricted, so the mailing address must be confirmed by phone.

_original_official_confirmation.department: City of Chicago Ticket Help Line
_original_official_confirmation.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing for Chicago parking citations.
